text: The 1989 World Junior Curling Championships were held from March 19 to 25 in Markham, Ontario, Canada. It was the first World Junior Championships to include teams from Italy. ==Men== ===Teams=== {| class=wikitable |- ! Country !! Skip !! Third !! Second !! Lead !!
